name: Sonarpur Jagaran Welfare Society
briefDescription: Our Vision: an equitable and a participatory, violence free society where people, both men and women live in peace with dignity, by unfolding their hopes and aspirations, aiming at sustainability. Goal: To promote processes which are sustainable, socially inclusive and gender equitable. To enable and capacitate the poor and marginalized sections of people or communities for achieving a dignifies qualitative life. The SONARPUR JAGARAN WELFARE SOCIETY believes on the inherent strength of communities to initiate, manage and sustain context specific prioritization in development process. Where the organization will facilitate the process by technical and other required support necessary to get the desired result.
